summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6248 for the improvement of South Henderson Street from Rainier Ave. South to Seward Park Ave. South; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 90217, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
